member.name: IRandomAccessStreamFileAccessMode.GetMode
member.summary: Retrieves the file access mode that was used when the StorageFile.OpenAsync method was called to open the random-access byte stream.
member.param: The file access mode that was used when the StorageFile.OpenAsync method was called to open the random-access byte stream. Cast this value as a Windows.Storage.FileAccessMode enumeration value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IRandomAccessStreamFileAccessMode
member.summary: Provides access to the file access mode that was used when the StorageFile.OpenAsync method was called to open the random-access byte stream.
